title: IHCL expands footprint in Sikkim with opening of Taj Guras Kutir Resort & Spa in Gangtok
description: Indian Hotels Company (IHCL) has opened the Taj Guras Kutir Resort & Spa in Gangtok, Sikkim, as part of its expansion plans in the region. The 69-key resort, situated on 14 acres, showcases Sikkimese aesthetics and contemporary design. Each room features a unique Thangka, a local Buddhism-inspired painting.
